verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> which came to Zephaniah, <WH6846> the son <WH1121> of Cushi, <WH3570> the son <WH1121> of Gedaliah, <WH1436> the son <WH1121> of Amariah, <WH568> the son <WH1121> of Hezekiah, <WH2396> in the days <WH3117> of Josiah, <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Amon, <WH526> king <WH4428> of Judah. <WH3063>
I will utterly <WH622> sweep away <WH5486> everything off of the surface of the earth, <WH6440> says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>

I will sweep away <WH5486> man <WH120> and animal. <WH929> I will sweep away <WH5486> the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> the fish <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> and the heaps <WH4384> of rubble with the wicked. <WH7563> I will cut off <WH3772> man <WH120> from <WH6440> the surface of the earth, <WH127> says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>

I will stretch out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> against Judah, <WH3063> and against all the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem. <WH3389> I will cut off <WH3772> the remnant <WH7605> of Baal <WH1168> from this place: <WH4725> the name <WH8034> of the idolatrous <WH3649> and pagan priests, <WH3548>

those who worship <WH7812> the army <WH6635> of the sky <WH8064> on the housetops, <WH1406> those who worship <WH7812> and swear <WH7650> by Yahweh <WH3068> and also swear <WH7650> by Malcam, <WH4428>
those who have turned back <WH5472> from <WH310> following Yahweh, <WH3068> and those who haven't <WH1245> sought Yahweh <WH3068> nor inquired after him. <WH1875>

Be silent <WH2013> at the presence <WH6440> of the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3068> for the day <WH3117> of Yahweh <WH3068> is at hand. <WH7138> For Yahweh <WH3068> has prepared <WH3559> a sacrifice. <WH2077> He has consecrated <WH6942> his guests. <WH7121>

It will happen in the day <WH3117> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s sacrifice, <WH2077> that I will punish <WH6485> the princes, <WH8269> the king <WH4428>'s sons, <WH1121> and all those who are clothed <WH3847> with foreign <WH5237> clothing. <WH4403>

In that day, <WH3117> I will punish <WH6485> all those who leap <WH1801> over the threshold, <WH4670> who fill <WH4390> their master <WH113>'s house <WH1004> with violence <WH2555> and deceit. <WH4820>

In that day, <WH3117> says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> there will be the noise <WH6963> of a cry <WH6818> from the fish <WH1709> gate, <WH8179> a wailing <WH3215> from the second <WH4932> quarter, <WH1419> and a great crashing <WH7667> from the hills. <WH1389>

Wail, <WH3213> you inhabitants <WH3427> of Maktesh, <WH4389> for all the people <WH5971> of Canaan <WH3667> are undone! <WH1820> All those who were loaded <WH5187> with silver <WH3701> are cut off. <WH3772>

It will happen at that time, <WH6256> that I will search <WH2664> Jerusalem <WH3389> with lamps, <WH5216> and I will punish <WH6485> the men <WH582> who are settled <WH7087> on their dregs, <WH8105> who say <WH559> in their heart, <WH3824> "Yahweh <WH3068> will not do good, <WH3190> neither will he do evil. <WH7489>"

Their wealth <WH2428> will become a spoil, <WH4933> and their houses <WH1004> a desolation. <WH8077> Yes, <WH1129> they will build houses, <WH1004> but won't <WH3427> inhabit them. <WH5193> They will plant vineyards, <WH3754> but won't <WH8354> drink their wine. <WH3196>

The great <WH1419> day <WH3117> of Yahweh <WH3068> is near. <WH7138> It is near, <WH7138> and hurries <WH4118> greatly, <WH3966> the voice <WH6963> of the day <WH3117> of Yahweh. <WH3068> The mighty man <WH1368> cries <WH6873> there bitterly. <WH4751>

That day <WH3117> is a day <WH3117> of wrath, <WH5678> a day <WH3117> of distress <WH4691> and anguish, <WH6869> a day <WH3117> of trouble <WH6869> and ruin, <WH4875> a day <WH3117> of darkness <WH2822> and gloom, <WH653> a day <WH3117> of clouds <WH6051> and blackness, <WH6205>
a day <WH3117> of the trumpet <WH7782> and alarm, <WH8643> against the fortified <WH1219> cities, <WH5892> and against the high <WH1364> battlements. <WH6438>

I will bring distress <WH6887> on men, <WH120> that they will walk <WH1980> like blind men, <WH5787> because they have sinned <WH2398> against Yahweh, <WH3068> and their blood <WH1818> will be poured out <WH8210> like dust, <WH6083> and their flesh <WH3894> like dung. <WH1561>

Neither their silver <WH3701> nor their gold <WH2091> will be able <WH3201> to deliver <WH5337> them in the day <WH3117> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s wrath, <WH5678> but the whole land <WH776> will be devoured <WH398> by the fire <WH784> of his jealousy; <WH7068> for he will make <WH6213> an end, <WH926> yes, a terrible end, <WH3617> of all those who dwell <WH3427> in the land. <WH776>
